channel.title: AutoSave Feature?
channel.description:
There is no tutorial request forum.. so I'm hoping I posted this in the right spot.
I'm looking for information on how to make a timed event. Autosave preferably, but if you just tell me how to make a timed event I can build in the autosave myself, and I'd appreciate it. It would also be very nice if you could comment out every spot so I know whats what, and can figure it out myself if I need anything else in the future. Thanks very much!
